channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti all over Coop shutters in The Village, 14th January
item.description:
Graffiti with normal.Loose $V tag appeared on Coop shutters in The Village

item.title: Fly tipped bases, mattresses etc., 14th January
item.description:
Settee base and bed bases. Settee base been here weeks and previously reported. Bed base and mattress etc. have recently been added because fly tipped items only attract more fly tipping. This will become a regular dump if not dealt with quickly. Please remove.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hylton Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piles of Leaves left behind, 14th January
item.description:
After your road sweeper came to clean The Avenue and then The Drive this morning a few piles of leaves were left behind. It looks worse than before he came, although he did clear out the drain that was completely covered. I assume that his truck was full and he will return to finish the job later today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, The Drive, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lifted paving stones, 14th January
item.description:
Report ref: 8444892 I have received today an email advising problem resolved. The item has not been resolved. Tree roots from tree outside 18 Palace View are still pushing the pavements and tarmac up making the pavement area quite dangerous for people and prams also mobility issued. The problem HAS NOT been fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ringers Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street needs sweeping, 14th January
item.description:
I reported that the street needed cleaning on Sunday & received a notification on Monday to say that it had been cleaned & my enquiry has been closed & yet it has not been cleaned. The bags of dog poo outside number 54 are still there and so too other rubbish. Could we please sweep the street properly. Many thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winchester Avenue, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40-42, Baker Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Fridge freezer and now other items added, 14th January
item.description:
This 'EYESORE' of rubbish has been outside the block of flats where i live on the pathway for several weeks now, it started off with just the fridge freezer but as the weeks have gone on more rubbish has been added to it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Street, Lessness Heath, Greater London

item.title: Outside number 2, 3, 4 Wavel Mews, 14th January
item.description:
Thames Water has repaired a broken pipe but not relayed the cobbles properly. Some are loose and have no cement bonding to fix them in place. There is also a lot of silt and cement left on the road and in the drainage gulley. Please can you send your highways team to fix this. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Wavel Mews, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 x Barriers left on pavement o/s 5 - 6 Warren Road, 14th January
item.description:
The works have been completed on the pavement but the barriers have been left. They keep getting blown by the wind so need removing immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Warren Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 south west corner of Park Hall, 14th January
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 south west corner of Park Hall Road (ie BT phone exchange corner) junction yellow plastic grit bin multi tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for reporting pin, picture & Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4356578,-0.0937271,3a,26.6y,196.19h,85.97t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sjvBspJrcsVLL7onXGZdCJw!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D4.0270550000461185%26panoid%3DjvBspJrcsVLL7onXGZdCJw%26yaw%3D196.19297911047823!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI2MDEwNy4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D
